name: RunCloudShellTestSuite
description: Run a CloudShell test suite and wait for completion
author: Quali
helpMarkDown: Run a CloudShell test suite and wait for completion

inputs.name: suiteName
inputs.label: Suite Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the test suite to start

inputs.name: testInputs
inputs.label: Test Inputs
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Inputs for all tests that take inputs. 

Example:

    TestShell\Tests\Shared\Test1:

    Traffic_Duration_Minutes=5
    Load_Type=Video


    TestShell\Tests\Shared\Folder1\Test2:

    Color=Red

inputs.name: includeBlueprint
inputs.label: Reserve a Sandbox
inputs.helpMarkDown: Reserve a sandbox for this test suite run

inputs.name: blueprintName
inputs.label: Blueprint Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the blueprint to use for the sandbox

inputs.name: blueprintInputs
inputs.label: Blueprint Inputs
inputs.helpMarkDown:
# Blueprint inputs, one per line

Example:

    Cloud Provider=AWS Oregon
    Count=5
